title: The H.G. Wells Time Machine Retold: The Broke Taxpayer versus Evil Capitol Hill
description: Experience the retelling of H.G.Wells' masterpiece!Featuring the overtaxed American as "the time traveler" and the Capitol Hill bureaucrats as "the Morlocks"A story of one man's quest to find a future without Republicans, Democrats and taxes.A genius, gut-busting read. Highly recommended!- Steve Grimes, The Lockton Tribune
author: Edward Scarzi
